title: First Blood lag
body: I usually play ARAM, so I'm not sure if it's map-specific, but I get about a half-second of lag right when first blood occurs. I saw a few posts from years ago complaining about this issue, so I know it's happened before at least.

replies.body: When First Blood happens, you'll notice there's a special graphic that pops up. If you get a little stutter every time, there's a good chance that the game assets for that graphic could be damaged. Open your client options and run a Repair, and that should be able to smooth things out.
It's been a while since I posted this, so I'm not sure if the repair I just did was the actual fix, but I don't think this stutter is happening anymore.
